scripts.validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('hsl')) { console.log('Data exists.'); process.exit(0); } else { console.error('Data missing.'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('hsl')) { fs.rmSync('hsl', { recursive: true }); console.log('Cleaned hsl/ directory'); } else { console.log('Nothing to clean.'); }"
